verses.roman:
jāti-dhana-jana khānera sakala la-ila
bahu-dina paryanta grāma ujāḍa rahila

synonyms: jāti—birthright; dhana—riches; jana—followers; khānera—of Rāmacandra Khān; sakala—everything; la-ila—he took away; bahu-dina—a long time; paryanta—for; grāma—the village; ujāḍa rahila—remained deserted.
translation: The Mohammedan minister took away Rāmacandra Khān's position, wealth and followers. For many days the village remained deserted.
